title: Colts Drama, Jimmy G Extension & Eagles Parade
itunes:title: Colts Drama, Jimmy G Extension & Eagles Parade
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Lindsay Rhodes- recap some big news to come out of the league since the Eagles were crowned Super Bowl champs, including Josh McDaniels backing out of the Colts' head coaching gig (4:00); The 49ers make Jimmy Garoppolo a very rich man (18:00); Lindsay Rhodes puts her own spin on "Odds & Ends" (28:00); Colleen Wolfe checks in from the Eagles' Super Bowl parade (35:00); And clear-eyed, full-hearted final Super Bowl takes (47:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
